scripts.dev: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const backend = spawn('node', ['server.js'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); const frontend = spawn('vite', ['--host', '0.0.0.0', '--port', '5000'], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true }); process.on('SIGINT', () => { backend.kill(); frontend.kill(); process.exit(); });"
